name: Violations; penalty
text:
§440-34  Violations; penalty.  Any individual or club in violation of this chapter or the rules of the commission shall be fined not more than $5,000 for each violation or imprisoned not more than one year, or both. [L 1929, c 216, §39; RL 1935, §7024; RL 1945, §7585; RL 1955, §165-36; HRS §440-34; am L 1976, c 15, §3; am L 2004, c 135, §22]
 
Cross References
 
  Classification of offense and authorized punishment, see §§701-107, 706-640, and 706-663.
